cookieConsent.message: This app uses functional cookies only to save your preferences (theme, settings, date selections). We do not collect personal data via cookies, use tracking cookies, or send cookie data to external servers. All data processing happens locally in your browser.

loginDialog.title: Login to Glooko
loginDialog.description: Sign in with your personal Microsoft account to access all features.
loginDialog.errorMessage: Failed to login. Please try again.
loginDialog.googleComingSoon: Google Sign-In will be available soon! This feature is currently under development.

logoutDialog.title: Logout
logoutDialog.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to logout?

welcomeDialog.title: Welcome!
welcomeDialog.thankYou: Thank you for joining us! We're excited to help you manage and analyze your diabetes data.
welcomeDialog.cloudSettingsSyncDescription: Your app preferences (theme, glucose unit, thresholds, etc.) will be saved to the cloud so they sync across all your devices.
welcomeDialog.privacyFirstDescription: We only store your email address for account identification and your app preferences. No personal health data, glucose readings, or medical information is ever stored in our cloud.
welcomeDialog.privacyNote: If you prefer not to save settings to the cloud, click "Cancel" to log out. You can still use the app without logging in.

infrastructureErrorDialog.defaultDescription: An error occurred while connecting to our services.
infrastructureErrorDialog.serviceUnavailableDescription: Our services are currently unavailable. This could mean the infrastructure is being set up or there are temporary access issues.
infrastructureErrorDialog.networkErrorDescription: Unable to connect to our services. Please check your internet connection and try again.
infrastructureErrorDialog.accessDeniedDescription: Your session may have expired. Please try logging in again.
